MemoryInfobox.name: Honey Eyes
MemoryInfobox.description: 'After Kassandra provided Kleio with safe passage from Korinth, a musician soon fell in love with the 'Courtesan|hetaera'. Yet the ring she wished give her was stolen.'

General_Description: '''Honey Eyes''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Following her choice, Kassandra was faced with its consequences.
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' Chaire. ''Anything you need a [[mercenary]]'s help with?''
*'''Woman:''' ''I can't contain myself. My lover has eyes poured from [[honey]] by [[Aphrodite]] herself. Her lips taste as if they were picked from pomegranate seeds. Her scent–''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I get the picture.''
*'''Woman:''' ''But that's not even to speak of her soul. My darling [[Kleio]]'s sweet wanderer's heart lead her to me all the way from Korinth!''

<tabber>
|-|Actually, I brought Kleio here.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I actually provided safe passage for a ''[[Courtesan|hetaera]]'' named Kleio aboard my [[Adrestia|ship]].''
*'''Woman:''' ''You? You are responsible for the happiness that courses through every fiber of my being?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Looks like it.''
|-|That's enough.=
</tabber>

*'''Woman:''' ''Oh, mercenary, this is my lucky day. I had a ring I wished to get engraved for my darling Kleio, but it was stolen just this morning.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So you want me to take it from the bandits.''
*'''Woman:''' ''You catch on fast. Will you do it? / Obviously. Do we have a deal? / Yes, I need it back at all costs.''

(Accept - I'll bring it to you.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll help you.''
*'''Woman:''' ''The glory will be yours, mercenary.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Leave it to me.''
Kassandra hunted the bandits and retrieved the ring and returned to the woman.

(If already completed)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Sounds like you can stop worrying – I've taken care of everything.''

*'''Woman:''' ''Did you get it?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's all yours.''
*'''Woman:''' ''The gods were smiling on me the day we met. Thank you. Please, for your trouble.'' / ''The gods favored me the day we met. Take this for your troubles,'' misthios.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''All in a day's work.''

<tabber>
|-|[OFFER] You should join my crew.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're strong, capable, and obviously resourceful. I could use someone like you on my ship. What do you say?''
*'''Woman:''' ''The sea is a [[Muses|muse]] for many, but not for me. My own muse wouldn't be happy if I left.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're making a mistake, but I'll respect your decision.''
|-|Thank you.=
</tabber>
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped the musician regain her ring, and was rewarded for this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''

{{ACODMemories}}
[[Category:Memories of Kassandra]]
[[Category:Memories relived using the Animus HR-8.5]]
